A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were a lot of legitimately good scenes in this movie... but ultimately it was let down by bad directing. Too much time was spent on side stories\,  action sequences\, and gratuitous cutesy animal scenes instead of focusing on the core story. A number of plot points were contrived and character growth \"lessons\" were ham handed. If the movie could just go through one last editing pass\, have it's core story tightened and fluff removed\, it would be fantastic. As it is\, the cringe and meandering outweighs the good.
